status.aiDown: Sorry, I can't chat right now. OpenAI is expensive and I've used up all my credits.

command.error: There was an error while executing this command!
command.missingProperty: [WARNING] The command at '%s' is missing a required "data" or "execute" property.
command.rejection: Please use the #song-boy channel to request songs!

chat.channelPermission: :warning: Sorry I can't seem to connect to your voice channel.
chat.error: Something went wrong with the chat API.
chat.name: chat
chat.off: Sorry, this experimental command is currently turned off.

query.desc: Write anything you want to say or ask...
query.name: query

queue.empty: There are no songs currently in queue.
queue.name: queue

random.added: Added random song "%s" to the queue.
random.desc: Add a random song from all previously played tracks.
random.empty: There are no songs in the history to randomize.
random.name: random

skip.empty: There is nothing to skip, the queue is empty!
skip.name: skip

song.added: Added your song "%s" to the queue!
song.channelPermission: :warning: Sorry I can't seem to connect to your voice channel.
song.desc: Play or add a song to the queue.
song.name: song
song.noVoiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel to request a song!
song.queueEmpty: Queue is empty. Song Boy is out of music :cry:

query.desc: Type in the artist and/or song title to search!
query.name: query

stop.desc: Stop Songboy and wipe the playlist.
stop.name: stop

query.amount: Type in the amount of top requests you want!
query.name: query
